title: Cant play!!!!
body: Ya dont be a dumbass like me.. get drunk get mad punch a wall...... but hit straight stud.  Broke my mouse hand and now i cant play league for 6-8 weeks... Sigh Using my left hand only to type :({{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Good. You're a really toxic player anyways. Have fun getting back to the normal life! ;)
